sentences.cn: 求: 板报设计图! 水彩画版面的!

sentences.en: His paint in watercolor won the first prize in national competition.
sentences.cn: 他的水彩画在全国大赛中得了一等奖.

sentences.en: I prefer oil paintings to watercolor paintings.
sentences.cn: 与水彩画相比,我更喜欢油画.

sentences.en: Instead, she started to examine the kitchen carefully, evaluating each watercolor on the wall, each shelf, the spice box, the plants, the pots.
sentences.cn: 相反，她开始仔细检查厨房，评估每一种水彩，墙上的，架子上的，调味品盒子上的，植物的，以及锅上的。

sentences.en: It makes for a nice watercolor look.
sentences.cn: 它看起来像水彩的感觉.

sentences.en: Many of the works exhibited are watercolor paintings by middle school students.
sentences.cn: 这次展出的作品多是中学生们画的水彩画.

sentences.en: My uncle did a beautiful watercolor of a sunset while in Mexico.
sentences.cn: 我的叔叔在墨西哥时画了一幅漂亮的日落水彩画。

sentences.en: One looked everywhere green scene, like a watercolor painting.
sentences.cn: 一眼望去,到处都是一片绿景象, 就像一幅水彩画.

sentences.en: The third Watercolor Painting Exhibition will be held in Guangzhou.
sentences.cn: 第三届水彩画展将在广州举办.

sentences.en: They have some experience using watercolor paints.
sentences.cn: 他们有画水彩画的经验.

sentences.en: This is the way I paint a watercolor pen.

sentences.en: This watercolor is unmistakably a synthesis of nature.
sentences.cn: 这幅水彩画很明显是一种大自然综合体.

sentences.en: You'll consider you've stepped into a runing runing watercolor painting.
sentences.cn: 你会以为本人走进了一幅水彩画之中.
